description.value:
This white wood staff is capped at each end with a golden cross adorned with ruby cabochons. A staff of healing grants a +4 item bonus to the Hit Points you restore anytime you cast the heal spell using your own spell slots or charges from the staff.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stabilize]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clear Mind] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sound Body]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cleanse Affliction] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Cleanse Affliction] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clear Mind] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sound Body]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Breath of Life] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal]
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Clear Mind] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Field of Life] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal]
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Regenerate]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
